overview: A disfigured farmhand is killing the neighbors and collecting body parts in an attempt to resurrect his deceased sister. He is aided by a doctor who instructs him through the TV set. The town police pursue the farmhand in an attempt to stop the bloodshed...This film is a throw back to the horror films of the 1960's and 70's. Moto Psycho was filmed in Connecticut between 2005 and 2011.
title: Moto Psycho
